body_html:
Wow, what a code review! :) Thanks a lot @dave-andersen , @tmc ! This is maybe one of the best code reviews I had in the last years ｡^‿^｡
I'm going to sleep, that in Netherlands is a bit late. I went through almost all the comments but I still have to finish:

  • Add: NewGraphFromReader
  • Use a template for the getTensorFromGraph input string in order to avoid this redundancy
  • C++ Code review
  • Apply fixes to: tensorflow/g3doc/tutorials/image_recognition/index.md

And I want to go through all the code once again to be sure that I'm not forgetting anything, I hope I can have all ready for next week :)

body:
Wow, what a code review! :) Thanks a lot @dave-andersen , @tmc ! This is maybe one of the best code reviews I had in the last years ｡^‿^｡
I'm going to sleep, that in Netherlands is a bit late. I went through almost all the comments but I still have to finish:
- Add: NewGraphFromReader
- Use a template for the getTensorFromGraph input string in order to avoid this redundancy
- C++ Code review
- Apply fixes to: tensorflow/g3doc/tutorials/image_recognition/index.md

And I want to go through all the code once again to be sure that I'm not forgetting anything, I hope I can have all ready for next week :)
